name: Clobridge Consulting
tag_list: knowledge-management, information-management, digital-asset-management, repositories, open-access, open-data, libraries, library, communities-of-practice, taxonomies, research, needs-assessments
overview:
Clobridge Consulting specializes in working with organizations to support all dimensions of information and knowledge management – needs assessments, research, strategic planning, program development and implementation, monitoring and evaluation, and staff training.

Knowledge Management (KM) focuses on aligning people, processes, and information with technology. Typical Knowledge Management work includes conducting knowledge management audits to evaluate an organization’s current KM environment; identifying current KM strengths, gaps, bottlenecks, and areas for improvement; developing and launching KM strategies and initiatives.

Areas of expertise include: knowledge management and knowledge sharing, Communities of Practice, taxonomy development, Open Access, Open Data, open licensing schemes, 21st century libraries, digital curation, digital repositories and digital asset management, metadata, and knowledge management for development (KM4Dev).
